channel.title: Everybody has the power to like spawn stuff (::pickup) WHAT DO I DO?
channel.description:
HELP
Everyone has the power to spawn stuff (::pickup) what do i do to make it so they cant do that and only say ermmm mods n admins n co owners can do that? :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Everybody has the power to like spawn stuff (::pickup) WHAT DO I DO?
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

go in client.java and search this

else if (command.startsWith("pickup")

replace with this

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)

this makes it so only admins can spawn

Read full topic
item.source: Everybody has the power to like spawn stuff (::pickup) WHAT DO I DO?

item.title: Everybody has the power to like spawn stuff (::pickup) WHAT DO I DO?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Replace your pickup command with this :

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME") { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }
Where it says YOURNAME put your characters name in it. This makes it so that only you can use the pickup command.[

Read full topic

item.title: Everybody has the power to like spawn stuff (::pickup) WHAT DO I DO?
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

Search for “pickup” in the Client.java files. ( remember use the "s )
Then it will say some stuff LOl. Look for where it says " playerrights = 2 " and change the 2 to a 0 ( zero )

Read full topic
